name: Mutating Escapist
description:
Submission to Ludum Dare 50 under the theme "Escape the inevitable".

Your escape seems inevitable by just trying over and over... but do you have the skill to prove it?

A platformer in which you have to escape from  a laboratory guarded by an AI while mutating a new ability after each death. Adapt your approach and get to know the dangerous lab from different perspectives every time!

AD/Arrow controls, Space to jump, F to use your ability, Escape to Pause. Feedback and rating is appreciated!
